ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = '012E00000005gTA' && Contact_Attempt_2_Date__c > DATE(2013,08,29) && ISBLANK(Contact_Attempt_2_Time__c) && ISBLANK(Contact_2_Comments__c) && ISPICKVAL(Contact_2_Result__c,"")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Contact Attempt 2 Date is entered, Contact Attempt 2 Time, and Contact 2 Result should be entered also.
